message.content:
1. High performance: ChatGPT, powered by OpenAI Codex, is a high-performance AI language model that can generate high-quality responses in real-time.

2. Context-awareness: It understands and considers the context of the conversation while providing relevant answers or generating text-based content.

3. Adaptability: ChatGPT can adapt to many different types of tasks, such as answering questions, helping with homework, programming help, brainstorming ideas, creating conversational agents for interactive experiences etc.

4. Multilingual capability: Though primarily trained on English data sets at this moment, OpenAI has plans to research and develop models like GPT-3 that support multiple languages.

5. Continuous improvements: Regular updates are made available through API versions to improve its capabilities consistently with new training data and fine-tuning techniques over time.

6. Large range of token/content generation: Given enough tokens (like up-to 4096 tokens), it can create more extended texts or stories based on user prompts effectively maintaining coherence throughout passages generated by the model itself from scratch or basing off external sources you present during input interactions via your requests sent into an active API connection running between yourself+assist device employed come future moment events
